tool_description: Api showing climate change news internationally.
name: Xen climate change
title: Xen climate change

api_list.name: Source news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xen-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xen-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xen-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xen-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xen-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
